metadata.title: CVE-2021-21228 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in extensions in Google Chrome prior to90.0.4430.93 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to bypass navigation restrictions via a crafted ChromeExtension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
